Gmail:

package basic;

import org.openqa.selenium.By;
import org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver;
import org.openqa.selenium.WebElement;
import org.openqa.selenium.chrome.ChromeDriver;

public class Gmail {

	public static void main(String[] args) throws InterruptedException {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		WebDriver driver = new ChromeDriver();
		driver.get("http://gmail.com");
		WebElement usernameTextBox= driver.findElement(By.id("Email"));
		usernameTextBox.sendKeys("shobha.qa18@gmail.com");
		WebElement textNext = driver.findElement(By.id("next"));
		textNext.click();
		Thread.sleep(3000);
		WebElement userPassWord = driver.findElement(By.id("Passwd"));
		userPassWord.sendKeys("surajnidhi");
		WebElement signIn = driver.findElement(By.id("signIn"));
		signIn.click();
		Thread.sleep(3000);
		WebElement compose = driver.findElement(By.xpath("//*[@gh='cm']"));
		compose.click();
		//WebElement newMessage = driver.findElement(By.xpath("/html/body/div[14]/div/div/div/div[1]/div[3]/div[1]/div[1]/div/div/div/div[2]/div/div[2]/div/div"));
		//newMessage.isDisplayed();
		WebElement toEmail = driver.findElement(By.xpath("//*[@name = 'to']"));
		toEmail.sendKeys("k.r.shobha@gmail.com");
		WebElement subJect = driver.findElement(By.xpath("//input[@name = 'subjectbox']"));
		subJect.sendKeys("This is Automated mail");
		WebElement message = driver.findElement(By.xpath("//*[@role = 'textbox']"));
		message.sendKeys("Hello, This is Shobha");
		Thread.sleep(3000);
		WebElement send = driver.findElement(By.xpath("//tbody/tr/td[1]/div/div[text()='Send']"));
		Thread.sleep(3000);
		send.click();
//		WebElement link = driver.findElement(By.id("link_vsm"));
//		link.isDisplayed();
		

	}

}
